alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 9:08PM CDT until July 19 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Logan County in west central Kansas... Western Gove County in west central Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 907 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles north of Scott State Lake, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Logan and western Gove Counties, including the following locations... The Monument Rocks. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 84 and 87. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall with this storm may lead to localized flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
